titlealts.searchtitle: Supporting Information: Government Data Standards Catalogue - Description

div.p: set out the rationale, approach and rules for setting and agreeing the set of Government Data Standards (GDS) to be used in the schemas and other interchange processes
contained the standards agreed to date.
The Government Data Standards Catalogue has been archived and is still available for reference only.
The archived Government Data Standards Catalogue can be found on the archived Cabinet Office website.
